editor

Class Editor

  • java.lang.Object
    • editor.Editor

  • public class Editor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main processing class of the Fotoshop application. Fotoshop is a very simple image editing tool. Users can apply a number of filters to an image. That's all. It should really be extended to make it more useful! To edit an image, create an instance of this class and call the "edit" method.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Editor getInstance()
        Editor singleton accessor, creates an editor instance if none is found else returns it.
        Returns:
        Editor object. Instanciated with default values.

      • getInstance

        public static Editor getInstance(java.lang.String bundleName,
                                 java.lang.String local,
                                 java.lang.String lang,
                                 UI ui)
        Editor singleton accessor, creates an editor instance if none is found else returns it.
        Parameters:
        bundleName - String, you can specify a bundlename contained in internationalisation package from the command line. Default "MiscBundle".
        local - String, you can specify a locality like "GB", "US", "FR". Default "GB".
        lang - String, language selected like "en", "fr". Default "en".
        ui - UI object, GUI or CLI
        Returns:
        Editor object.

      • edit

        public void edit()
        Main edit routine. Loops until the end of the editing session.

      • processCommand

        public void processCommand(Command command)
        Check if a command is known in our loaded data from internationalisation bundles. Then call execution function with the right index by translating the command in given language to its index.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to be processed.

      • getParser

        public Parser getParser()
        Return parser object reference used to have access to the parser from the script task.
        Returns:
        Parser object.

      • getCommands

        public Tasks getCommands()
        Return the tasks object.
        Returns:
        Tasks object which stores all command tasks indexed by a string which is the command name in selected language.

      • getUI

        public UI getUI()
        Return an user interface object.
        Returns:
        UI object which is a GUI or a CLI.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Set the running state of the editor to false (exit the program then).

      • turnOn

        public void turnOn()
        Set the running state of the editor to true.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Return the running state of the editor.
        Returns:
        Boolean representing running state of the editor.
